name: 曹大鵬
objective:
電力系統運轉與控制課程包含下列各項:
1. 電力系統經濟調度2. 傳輸損失3. 機組規劃4. 水火力機組協調5. 發電控制6. 電力系統互聯7. 電力系統安全度8. 狀態評估
schedule:
Week1:Introduction
Week2~3:Characteristics of Power Generation Units
Week4~6:Economic Dispatch of Thermal Units and Methods of Solution vs. A.Optimization within constraints
    B.Dynamic Programming
Week7~8:Transmission System Effects
Week9:Mid-term Examination
Week10~11:Unit Commitment vs. Dual Optimization on a nonconvex probem
Week12~13:Generation withLimited Energy Supply vs. Linear Programming
Week14~15:Hydrothermal Coordination vs. Hydro-scheduling with Storage Limitations
Week16~17:Production Cost Models vs. Probability Methods and Users in Generation Planning
Week 18:Control of Generation
materials: Allen J Wood, Bruce F. Wollenberg:”Power Generation, Operation, and Control”, 2nd Edition, 1996. 科大圖書代理
